Average Rating: 4.2
Product Details: {'Brand': 'NYX PROFESSIONAL MAKEUP', 'Skin Type': 'All', 'Item Form': 'Cream', 'Finish Type': 'Cream, Matte', 'Age Range (Description)': 'Adult', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Package Dimensions': '3.8 x 0.5 x 0.5 inches; 0.63 Ounces', 'Item model number': '0800897840327', 'Manufacturer': 'Nyx'}
Review Text: This colour is so beautiful ! I was looking for something similar to Anastasia Beverly hills lipsticks (can't spend $30 on a lipstick). This was sold for cheaper. It looks a lot like Vamp from ABH. It's a gorgeous matte colour. It has become one of my favorite !
Review Title: Gorgeous colour !
Rating: 5.0
--------------------------------------------------
reference_summary:
Proclaim Open Top Mesh Wrap
Proclaim
['For those times when you need to protect the edges of your style, the Proclaim Style It Up Open Top Mesh Wrap is ideal. This wrap has an open top and a Velcro fastener and is designed to cover the edges of your hair, leaving the crown open. The breathable material lets your hair get enough air and stay controlled without being smothered.']
{'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Package Dimensions': '7 x 4 x 0.1 inches; 1 Pounds', 'UPC': '019663378166', 'Manufacturer': 'Proctor & Gamble'}
Even though I have to be careful not to let my long hair get caught in the Velcro closure I really like this mesh wrap because it makes cross wrapping so much easier, I like to use this to keep my hair in place...it's better than sleeping with duck clips in your hair.
great for cross wrapping hair
La Femme Blush-on Rouge-Russet
La Femme
{'Brand': 'La Femme', 'Unit Count': '1 Count', 'Number of Items': '1', 'Style': 'Compact', 'Package Type': 'Palette'}
I was expecting it to be matte but instead it's full of sparkles, which I hate. It's also too powdery, which makes a mess everywhere if you are not careful. this also causes you to use too much product...in the end wasting so much of it. The colours are pretty, but way lighter than what I expected. It's an okay product. Not surprised, when you look at the price it is sold for.
It's an okay product (very powdery, the colours are lighter than expected)
Soft'n Style Large Butterfly Clamps, 12 Count
Soft 'N Style
['Large butterfly clamps which is perfect for separating long or short hair and \xa0great for hot rollers.']
{'Brand': "Soft 'N Style", 'Hair Type': 'All', 'Age Range (Description)': 'Adult', 'Theme': 'Butterfly', 'Unit Count': '12 Count', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Product Dimensions': '2 x 3 x 2 inches; 1.6 Ounces', 'Item model number': '186B', 'UPC': '524883549628 767485035766 755332353774 882341400929 748616604990 884896789726 087768000039', 'Manufacturer': "Soft'n Style"}
I have had them for the past 3 years and they are still as good as new. They hold my thick hair in place, perfectly. They are really good quality. I would recommend them.
Great product, still as good as new after 3 years
La Femme Blush-on Rouge-Sienna
La Femme
{'Brand': 'La Femme', 'Unit Count': '1 Count', 'Style': 'Compact', 'Package Type': 'Palette', 'UPC': '796433017981'}
It's lighter than I what I expected but it's a very pretty color. I very much like it. The only problem is that it's very loose and can cause quite a mess if not careful.
Very pretty color
(3 Pack) NYX Butter Lipstick - Licorice
{'Skin Type': 'All', 'Item Form': 'Stick', 'Finish Type': 'Cream', 'Age Range (Description)': 'Adult', 'Package Information': 'Tube', 'UPC': '712395476239'}
This colour is very pretty, my mother and I love it so much Love NYX lipsticks. It's very soft and moisturizing, hence the name butter lipstick. Would definitely recommend.
Beautiful colour
NYX Liq Suede LipstickVintage, 1 Count

profile:
**Updated User Profile Summary:**

- **Hair Care Focus**: The user prioritizes effective hair management, seeking products that secure hairstyles while minimizing damage.
- **Preference for Functionality**: They appreciate practical solutions, favoring tools that simplify styling and maintain hairstyle integrity, emphasizing ease of use.
- **Material Sensitivity**: Breathable materials are essential, as comfort is crucial to mitigate any negative impact on hair health during styling or protection.
- **Positive Experience with Velcro**: Despite minor concerns about hair getting caught, their overall satisfaction indicates a strong preference for adjustable and versatile products.
- **Sleep Compatibility**: The user values solutions that offer comfort during sleep, emphasizing the importance of maintaining hairstyles overnight without discomfort.
- **Cosmetic Preferences**: They maintain a discerning attitude toward cosmetics, favoring well-performing, soft, and moisturizing products while avoiding overly sparkly and messy formulations. Recently, they've shown a notable appreciation for aesthetically pleasing colors, particularly in matte finishes, which underscores their desire for affordable, yet high-quality options.
- **Quality Endorsement**: The user emphasizes durability and quality in both hair and cosmetic tools, reflecting a commitment to efficient, reliable, and functional solutions.

Overall, the user demonstrates a clear inclination for practical, comfortable, and durable products in their beauty routine, balancing aesthetics, health, and convenience while remaining mindful of usability and cleanliness. Their recent preference for striking yet affordable lip colors complements their established approach to beauty.
